https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/jBZ3Zhq8r24orVKEyVO38SFWQ5h.jpg "Catching The Sea" is a 2005 short film by Woo Ming Jin about the lives of several people in a village after a mysterious disease strikes and kills their loved ones. Set in a dilapidating fishing island, the film is about reconciling death and moving on with life. A prequel/spin-off for Woo Ming Jin's subsequent feature "The Elephant and The Sea." Catching the Sea
